sources.title: Blaise Pascal
sources.description: In this evocative, atmospheric biography, Roberto Rossellini brings to life philosopher and mathematician Blaise Pascal, who, amid religious persecution and ignorance, believed in a harmony between God and science.

metadata.Plot: Blaise Pascal struggles to understand the natural world around him, in addition to an inner quest for religious faith.
metadata.Writer: Marcella Mariani, Renzo Rossellini, Roberto Rossellini
metadata.Actors: Pierre Arditi, Rita Forzano, Giuseppe Addobbati
